results.title: Metformin reduces intrahepatic fibrosis and intrapulmonary shunts in biliary cirrhotic rats.
results.text_hl: This study evaluated the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment on liver and lung in a non-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model with @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@biliary cirrhosis@@@ induced via common bile duct ligation (CBDL).

citations.NLM: Ko MT, Huang HC, Lee WS, Chuang CL, Hsin IF, Hsu SJ, Lee FY, Chang CC, Lee SD. Metformin reduces intrahepatic fibrosis and intrapulmonary shunts in biliary cirrhotic rats. J Chin Med Assoc. 2017 Aug;80(8):467-475. PMID: 28676445
